Package com.abdcelik

Class MenuDriven.Administrator

java.lang.Object
com.abdcelik.MenuDriven.Administrator
All Implemented Interfaces:
MenuDrivenAdministratorInterface
Enclosing class:
MenuDriven<E extends com.SearchTree.SearchTree<Software>>
private class MenuDriven.Administrator
extends java.lang.Object
implements MenuDrivenAdministratorInterface
Keeps administrator of the system. Administrator can add,remove and update item.
